problem_text: If m \angle A F B = 8 x - 6 and m \angle B F C = 14 x + 8, find the value of x so that \angle A F C is a right angle.
compact_text: If m \angle AFB = 8x-6 and m \angle BFC = 14x+8, find the value of x so that \angle AFC is a right angle.
annotat_text: If $m \angle AFB = 8x - 6$ and $m \angle BFC = 14x + 8$, find the value of $x$ so that $\angle AFC$ is a right angle.
